name: maggieobrien
text: Ray's secret is unflinching optimism. We could all learn a thing or two from him.

name: jamers
text: My best friend is essentially Ray. Awesome dude.

name: jonmw
text: wouldn't that make you essentially Roast Beef?

name: ferdinand
text: it's cool to see ray so young and worried about cash flow.  the older ray is jaded and richer than the dictionary definition of rich.  i can relate to younger ray more.  of course, by younger, i mean a couple of years, but whatever.

name: rowboat
text: Ray rolls with the punches. The punches of irritated silence and bubble-bursting common sense questions. Ray is the Ali of telemarketers. Stick and move.

name: tekende
text: Optimism! Maybe he decides to have optimism!

name: expellens
text: Ray knows his A.B.Cs... always be closing . He also knows that coffee is for closers.

name: actualtaunt
text:
Ray does not want third prize, and those steak knives look lame.
Mammet references earn you chubbies from me.

name: maggieobrien
text: A comment left by maggieobrien was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, SSDDR, choosebro, aperson)

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: i used linux to tell me how long i was in the bathroom.

name: bixschmix
text: That is just the type of thing I am not surprised to hear of LINUX being used for.

name: farqussus
text: is linux a clock?

name: tekende
text: Yes.

name: awko
text: I thought Linux was in Peanuts.

name: rumblefish
text: There's probably a clever comment about security blankets that could be made here by someone that knows anything about Linux.

name: farqussus
text: I hope not

name: landowmpg
text: Isn't Linux made by fat people?

name: dusty
text: Not just by fat people, all the fat people, working together.

name: thedon
text: Classic Ray

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Bocas Rancheros"

name: greenkoolayd
text: ranch mouths?  wtf?!

name: greenkoolayd
text: one of you sons of bitches better answer me or so help me.....

name: trollcollins
text: Teodore's face in the 3rd panel really lights up the funny centres of my brain.

name: m-e-charm
text: Yeah, dogg, I love when Teodor makes this face.

name: taiiga
text: teodor hates when ray treats him like he doesn't know him on the phone. he has reacted with a curt "i know who you are ray" every time.

name: quarantine
text: Ray really has no idea what this program is.

name: earendil
text: ohh back before ray posessed unlimited wealth...

name: charchar
text: You know Teodor is secretly thrilled a telemarketer pronounced his name properly.

name: mattylite
text: Ray has a telemarketing script-- a list of all the predictable questions with pre-written party-line answers ready to go.  In panel 7 he takes a while to flip to the last page...

name: jezebel
text: Huevos!  Leche!  Revolución!

name: glandwich
text: teodor never makes eyes like panel 3 anymore. i guess its a shame. i've forgotten how to have opinions so i'm not sure

name: especial
text: i've forgotten how to have opinions, too. what happened to us, glandwich?

name: dovey
text: I never realised Teodor had such a low tolerance for Ray's shit this early on in the game.

name: yogurtworld
text: Sales pitches have completely ruined the words "revolutionary" and "introducing".  "All-new" was never much a good word to begin with.

name: joek5142
text:
I hate to be the first to say it, but...

Bocas Rancheras*

name: zeromyerz
text: Is T examining his fingernails in panel 3?

name: zeromyerz
text: His imaginary fingernails?
